name: Microsoft Store Military & Student Discounts
description: 10% off select devices, free Office 365 for students
fullDescription: Microsoft Store offers 10% off select products for active military, veterans, and students, plus free Office 365 for students with a school email.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off select Surface devices, laptops, and tablets
- Free Office 365 for students with .edu email
- Military Appreciation Edition Microsoft 365 (~30% off through exchanges)
- Excludes Xbox consoles, games, and gift cards
- Online only at Microsoft Store
howToGetIt:
1. Visit microsoft.com/en-us/store/b/military or /b/education
2. Sign in and verify status
3. Students: use school email for free Office 365
4. Military: verify through store account
5. Discounted prices shown automatically when signed in
keywords: Microsoft, military discount, student discount, veteran, Surface, laptop, Xbox, Office 365, 10% off
